result.title: Level 1 sheet #2
result.content:
-- Gravity Flip

Code
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;

    int c[n];
    for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin>>c[i];
    }
    sort(c,c+n);
    for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
        cout<<c[i]<<" ";
    }
    return 0;
}

-- Twins

Code
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int num,maxx=0,remain=0,coin=0;
    cin>>num;
    int coins[num];
    for (int i=0;i<num;i++){
        cin>>coins[i];
        remain+=coins[i];
    }
    sort(coins,coins+num);
    reverse(coins,coins+num);
    for (int k=0;k<num;k++){
        coin++;
        maxx+=coins[k];
        remain-=coins[k];
        if (maxx>remain){
            break;
        }
    }
    cout<<coin<<endl;
    return 0;
}

-- Vasya and Socks

Code
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,m;
    int all,remain,counter;
    cin>>n>>m;
    all=n;
    while (n>=m){
        counter=n/m;
        remain=n%m;
        all+=counter;
        n=counter+remain;
        
    }
    cout<<all<<endl;
    
}

-- Choosing Teams

Code
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
  int n,k,counter=0;
  cin>>n>>k;
  int arr[n];
  for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
      cin>>arr[i];
      if (arr[i]+k<=5){
          counter++;
      }
  }
  cout<<counter/3<<endl;
}

-- Currency System in Geraldion

Code
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
const int N=1e6+5;

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int a[n];
    for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
    sort(a,a+n);
    if (a[0]!=1)
        cout<<"1";
    else
        cout<<"-1";

    return 0;
}

-- Mahmoud and a Triangle

Code
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    int a[n],p[n+1];
    for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("%d",a+i);
    }
    sort(a,a+n);
    for (int i=2;i<n;i++){
        if (a[i]<a[i-1]+a[i-2]){
            puts("YES");
            return 0;
        }
    }
    puts("NO");
}

-- Arrival of the General

Code
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int size,mi=100,ma=0,m,c;

    scanf("%d",&size);
    int heights[size];
    for(int i=0;i<size;i++){
        scanf("%d",&heights[i]);
        if(mi>=heights[i]){
            mi=heights[i];
            c=i;
        }

        if(ma<heights[i]){
            ma=heights[i];
            m=i;
        }
    }
        if(m>c){
            printf("%d",(size-1-c)+m-1);
        }
        else{
            printf("%d",(size-1-c)+m);
        }


    return 0;
}

-- New Year Candles

Code
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int a,b;
    int count,all,remain;
    cin>>a>>b;
    all=a;
    while (a>=b){
        
        count=a/b;
        remain=a%b;
        all+=count;
        a=count+remain;
    }
    cout<<all<<endl;
    
}

-- Laptops

Code
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
const int N=1e6+5;

bool comp (pair<int,int> i,pair<int,int> j) { return (i.second>j.second); }

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    pair<int,int> a[n];
    for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin>>a[i].first>>a[i].second;
    }

    sort(a,a+n,comp);
    for (int i=1;i<n;i++){
        if (a[i].second<a[i-1].second){
            if (a[i].first > a[i-1].first)
                return puts("Happy Alex");
        }
    }
        puts("Poor Alex");
    return 0;
}

-- Towers

Code
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
 int ar[1001];
int main(){
   int n,t,m=0;
   scanf("%d",&n);
   for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
   {
       scanf("%d",&t);
       if(ar[t]!=0)
        ++m;
       ++ar[t];
   }
   printf("%d %d",*max_element(ar,ar+1001),m);

}

#include <iostream>

int main()
{
    int n,m;

    all=n;
    while (n>=m){

-- Even Odds

Code
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long n,k;
    cin>>n>>k;
    if (k<=(n+1)/2){
        cout<<k*2-1;
    }else{
        cout<<(k-(n+1)/2)*2;
    }
    return 0;
}

-- Epic Game

Code
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

    int m;



int main()
{
    int a[2],n,coun=0,c;
    scanf("%d %d %d",&a[0],&a[1],&n);
      for(int i=0; ;i++){
          if(a[i%2]>n)
            c=n;
          else
            c=a[i%2];
        for(int j=1;j<=c;j++){
            if(a[i%2]%j==0&&n%j==0)
                m=j;

        }
         n-=m;

        if(n<=0)
            break;
        coun++;
      }

      if(coun%2==0)
        printf("0");
      else
        printf("1");
    return 0;
}

-- Games

Code
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int n,counter=0;
    cin>>n;
    int arr[n][2];
    for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
        for (int k=0;k<2;k++){
            cin>>arr[i][k];
        }
    }
    for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
        
            for (int m=0;m<n;m++){
                if (m==i){
                    continue;}
                if (arr[i][0]==arr[m][1]){
                    counter++;
                }
        }
    } 
    cout<<counter<<endl;
    return 0;
}

-- Dragons

Code
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    int s,n;
    scanf("%d%d",&s,&n);
    pair<int,int> arr[n];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)scanf("%d%d",&arr[i].first,&arr[i].second);
    sort(arr,arr+n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        if(arr[i].first>=s){
            puts("NO");
            return 0;
        }
        s+=arr[i].second;
    }puts("YES");
    return 0;
}
